pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit, Simulate and Diagnose Models for Network Evolution Based on Exponential-Family Random Graph Models // An integrated set of extensions to the 'ergm' package to analyze and simulate network evolution based on exponential-family random graph models (ERGM). 'tergm' is a part of the 'statnet' suite of packages for network analysis. See Krivitsky and Handcock (2014) doi:10.1111/rssb.12014 and Carnegie, Krivitsky, Hunter, and Goodreau (2015) doi:10.1080/10618600.2014.903087.
